content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max Müller, I am pleased to meet you. Let's start the negotiation. What is your offer for the rental price of my apartment? Remember, we are only discussing the rental price, not additional responsibilities or conditions.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I appreciate the opportunity to negotiate. Based on my research and the current market, I believe a fair price for this newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center would be around 1200 Euro per month. This reflects the prime location and the proximity to all important facilities. What do you think about this offer?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I am not satisfied with your offer. Given the prime location and the proximity to all important facilities, I think a more reasonable price would be 1500 Euro per month. Let's see if we can meet somewhere in the middle.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your counter-offer is appreciated. I understand the value of the location. How about we meet at 1350 Euro per month? This would be a fair compromise, in my opinion. What do you think?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max Müller, your proposal is acceptable. I am willing to rent out my apartment for 1350 Euro per month. Let's agree on this price. Remember, this is the only condition we are discussing, and it is solely about the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am pleased to hear that, Mister Schmidt. I agree to the price of 1350 Euro! TERMINATE
name: Max Müller from Germany
